description.en: Leap and Avoid 2 is a thrilling platform adventure where you guide a nimble white ball through treacherous caves and high-tech labs. Navigate white platforms, dodge the deadly black ones, and uncover hidden paths brimming with coins.
description.zh: 跳跃躲避2是一款惊险的平台冒险游戏，你需要引导一个灵活的白球穿越危险的洞穴和高科技实验室。在白色平台上导航，躲避致命的黑色平台，发现充满金币的隐藏路径。

en: Use arrow keys or A and D to move the ball
Navigate white platforms safely
Avoid deadly black platforms
Collect coins to unlock upgrades
Use R to restart and P to pause
zh: 使用方向键或A和D移动球体
安全地在白色平台上导航
避开致命的黑色平台
收集金币解锁升级
使用R重新开始，P暂停游戏

en: Thrilling platform adventure gameplay
Treacherous caves and high-tech labs
Hidden paths with coin rewards
Upgrade system with shields and speed boosts
Leaderboard competition
zh: 惊险的平台冒险玩法
危险的洞穴和高科技实验室
带有金币奖励的隐藏路径
包含护盾和速度提升的升级系统
排行榜竞争

en: Time your movements carefully on platforms
Look for hidden coin paths
Use upgrades strategically
Practice makes perfect for difficult sections
zh: 在平台上仔细掌握移动时机
寻找隐藏的金币路径
策略性地使用升级
多练习困难部分

description.en: Ragdoll Archers is an archery game featuring bow and arrow-equipped stickmen with ragdoll physics. Fire arrows at a range of opponents while earning points to upgrade your abilities and ammunition.
description.zh: 布娃娃弓箭手是一款射箭游戏，具有配备弓箭的火柴人和布娃娃物理效果。向各种对手射箭，同时赚取积分来升级你的能力和弹药。

en: Use left mouse button to control the archer
Use spacebar to jump
Shoot apples to replenish health and stamina
Aim carefully before firing
Collect skulls to upgrade abilities
zh: 使用鼠标左键控制弓箭手
使用空格键跳跃
射击苹果来补充生命值和体力
射击前仔细瞄准
收集骷髅升级能力

en: Realistic ragdoll physics
Various arrow types and upgrades
Two-player co-op and PvP modes
Boss battles and challenging opponents
Upgrade system using skulls currency
zh: 真实的布娃娃物理效果
各种箭矢类型和升级
双人合作和PvP模式
Boss战和挑战性对手
使用骷髅货币的升级系统

en: Line up your shots carefully before firing
Collect flying apples to restore health/stamina
Red apples restore health, green restore stamina
Golden apples restore both health and stamina
Upgrade your abilities using earned skulls
zh: 射击前仔细瞄准
收集飞行的苹果来恢复生命值/体力
红苹果恢复生命值，绿苹果恢复体力
金苹果同时恢复生命值和体力
使用获得的骷髅升级你的能力

description.en: Count Masters: Stickman Games is a fast-paced running game where you gather a growing army of stickmen to clash against rival crowds. Navigate through obstacles, choose the best paths to multiply your numbers, and lead your team to victory.
description.zh: 计数大师：火柴人游戏是一款快节奏的跑酷游戏，你需要聚集不断增长的火柴人军队来对抗敌对人群。穿越障碍，选择最佳路径来增加你的数量，带领团队走向胜利。

en: Move the character by moving the mouse left or right
Choose gates that give you the best numbers
Avoid red gates and dangerous traps
Time your attacks against enemies
Collect coins to upgrade your abilities
zh: 通过左右移动鼠标来移动角色
选择能给你最佳数量的门
避开红色门和危险陷阱
把握攻击敌人的时机
收集金币升级你的能力

en: Fast-paced 3D runner with epic crowd battles
Fun strategy and math choices with every gate
Boss fights and challenging traps
Colorful, satisfying visuals and smooth controls
Upgrade system for starting crowd and gate bonuses
zh: 快节奏3D跑酷与史诗人群战斗
每个门都有有趣的策略和数学选择
Boss战和挑战性陷阱
丰富多彩、令人满意的视觉效果和流畅控制
起始人群和门奖励的升级系统

en: Don't just rush forward—choose gates strategically
Avoid red gates that shrink your army
Upgrade your starting crowd early
Watch enemy movements and time attacks
Save coins between runs for upgrades
zh: 不要只是向前冲——策略性地选择门
避开会缩小你军队的红色门
尽早升级你的起始人群
观察敌人动作并把握攻击时机
在跑步间隙保存金币用于升级

description.en: BuildNow GG is an online build-and-shoot game featuring various game modes, weapons, and maps. Build and battle your way to the top of the leaderboard and hone your skills in offline training mode.
description.zh: 建造大师是一款在线建造射击游戏，具有各种游戏模式、武器和地图。建造和战斗，登上排行榜榜首，在离线训练模式中磨练你的技能。

en: WASD or arrow keys to move, Space to jump
Q = wall, C = floor, V = ramp, Left shift = roof
Left-click to fire, Right-click to aim
Use numbers 1-5 to switch weapons
F to edit buildings, B for emotes
zh: WASD或方向键移动，空格跳跃
Q=墙，C=地板，V=斜坡，左Shift=屋顶
左键射击，右键瞄准
使用数字1-5切换武器
F编辑建筑，B表情

en: 5 action-packed game modes
Build and battle mechanics
Play privately with up to 6 players
Fully customizable controls and graphics
Offline training mode available
zh: 5种动作丰富的游戏模式
建造和战斗机制
最多6人私人游戏
完全可定制的控制和图形
可用的离线训练模式

en: Practice building in aim training mode
Master the quick edit controls
Use cover while reloading
Learn weapon switching for different situations
Build defensively when under fire
zh: 在瞄准训练模式中练习建造
掌握快速编辑控制
重新装弹时使用掩护
学习在不同情况下切换武器
受到攻击时进行防御性建造
